page.title: 06MY SCHOOL DAY
page.content: I am Caroline,I am 11 years old and I go to a primary school in Chippenham. The school is for children aged 5 to 11 and there are about 230 of us.We are in classes of about 30 children of the same age. The school day starts at 9.00am.On most mornings all the children go to the school hall for an assembly. At school we read,write,draw,sing, play and make things.We also study for project work and religion,do maths and have discussions. We have two breaks in the day;a short one in the morning when we go out on the playground,and a lunch time break. There are two sittings for lunch.One for the children who have dinners cooked at school and one for the children who bring packed lunches. Afternoon school finishes at 3.15pm.
